valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 1 Nov 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sun 2 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low 100 miles west of Bailey 959 expected 150 miles west of Bailey 969 by 1800 Saturday. New low expected western Norwegian Basin 978 by same time
